text:
Bush Terminal, Brooklyn
6-23-1930
Fairchild Aerial Surveys
title: East River - Shore and skyline - Bush Terminal, Brooklyn.

folder: Pier 6 - [New York State Barge Canal Terminal.], Manhattan, NY
text:
East River, river scene, showing barges docked at pier 6, the New York State Canal Terminal, off South Street, at the foot of Coenties Slip.

May 26, 1926.

P. L. Sperr.
title: East River - River scenes - Pier 6 - [New York State Barge Canal Terminal.]

folder: Pier 6 - [New York State Barge Canal Terminal - City Bank-Farmers Trust Company - Seamen's Church Institute - 60 Wall Street Tower.], Manhattan, NY
text:
East River, showing pier 6, the New York State Canal Terminal, off South Street, at the foot of Coenties Slip and barges docked alongside of it. In the background appear (right to left): the 60 Wall Tower Building, Seamen's Church Institute, and City Bank Farmer's Trust Building. This is a set of 3 views.

P. L. Sperr.

D7 NEG.#4086
D8 NEG.#4087

October 29, 1932.
title: East River - Pier 6 - [New York State Barge Canal Terminal - City Bank-Farmers Trust Company - Seamen's Church Institute - 60 Wall Street Tower.]

text:
(1)
East River, showing pier 6, the New York State Barge Canal Terminal off South Street, at the foot of Coenties Slip. The view is in a northerly direction.

April 17, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, another view.

April 17, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
An additional view at a later date.

July 24, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.
